project.description: Imports data dictionaries into HPDS format.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: destination_bucket_hash
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the git hash of the commit that changed the data set

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash ### Load Dictionary ETL Image aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz
HPDS_ETL_IMAGE=`docker load < ./pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz | cut -d ' ' -f 3` echo $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE ls -alh `pwd`
mkdir -p tmp/ mkdir -p local/source/
### Pull dictionaries from s3 aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} .
awk -F, '{print $1","$2","$3","$8","$9}' Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
echo "testing" unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
# Generate mappings cat inputs.csv
IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then
if [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "topmed" ]] || [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "parent" ]]; then
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ local/source/${stdy_id}/rawData/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${stdy_id}*.xml"
fi else echo "$abv_name not ready for processing" fi done < inputs.csv
#### Execute dictionary import # volume mount pwd that contains original data files as /opt/local/source/ # mkdir -p "${WORKSPACE}"/output
docker run -i -v "${WORKSPACE}"/local/source:/local/source -v "${WORKSPACE}"/output:/usr/local/docker-config/search/ -eLOADER_NAME=RawDataImporter $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE
cd "$WORKSPACE"/output
tar -cvzf dictionary.javabin.tar.gz *.javabin
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp dictionary.javabin.tar.gz s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/
